# Guide

# Explore our guides and examples to integrate Userfront.


Quickstart Examples API docs

# Getting started

When you sign up for Userfront, your account has a Toolkit with everything you need to allow users to sign up and log in.

Topic
Toolkit Add tools to your website for signup, login, password reset, and more.
Tokens Learn how tokens are stored and how you can use each one.
Multi-tenancy Group users within your application for things like teams, accounts, or organizations.
Webhook reference Documentation for Userfront webhooks.
Metrics User & tenant analytics you can use to grow your project.
Default-Secure Software Principles behind Default-Secure Software (DSS).
Glossary Common terms and what they mean.
Last Updated: 8/31/2021, 9:15:25 AM
